column5: Just wondering if anyone knows whats happening on Lake Scugog as far as the ice? Thanks
Sweet , so is the whole lake iced over? Will we be able to go out for opener you think? Thanks
I would say yes but as always be SAFE out there guys. If you need to fish take a friend just in case something happens
Scugog will be a solid 10 inches of ice if this temp keeps up. I only remember 2 years that we used a boat on Jan 1 in 30 years.
other then the first 5 feet of shore.. View Lake side is solid as well as the normal holes near st.Christopher
